name: CogniScope
description: We offer a pioneering SaaS solution for gaming studios that leverages advanced AI models based on psychological studies to interpret player emotions and behaviors, transforming insights into prioritized action items for strategic decision-making.
one_liner: We offer a pioneering SaaS solution for gaming studios that leverages advanced AI models based on psychological studies to interpret player emotions and behaviors, transforming insights into prioritized action items for strategic decision-making.
